title: Here are some clay creations I've made :D
body:
I have more post of my creations on my instagram account :D
ig: http://instagram.com/riezru/

The four ninjas: {{champion:84}} , {{champion:85}} , {{champion:98}} ,{{champion:238}}  http://instagram.com/p/xix2kGPfja/?modal=true
The angel sisters: {{champion:25}} , {{champion:10}}   http://instagram.com/p/xqpjQUvfvC/?modal=true 
and more!  
http://instagram.com/p/wqsFV2vful/?modal=true

ig: http://instagram.com/riezru/

Check them all out :) and follow me :3 

Any recommendations are welcome :D 
I like to make groups so if you have any ideas feel free to comment and vote

replies.body:
That's amazing!  I love the Lulu and Poro the mostest 

EDIT:
I take it back, I love the Annie one the most that you have on your site!

HAHA 
thanks~ :D
I love Lulu the most followed by the Ninjas

I'm planning on creating all the champions just like the ninjas :3

Voted other for PENTAKILL Band, DO IT!
{{champion:30}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:2}}

aww :/ 
Unfortunately I want to do all the champions in their original skins.

Once I finish making all 123 champions thats when I'll be making champions with other skins 

Sorry
These look really nice, well done. As for what  I would like to see personally, the Voidborn and the "Void Generals" per-say please and thank you there.

> [{quoted}](name=Airashi,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=paujYmMY,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-01-11T22:41:56.623+0000)
>
> Who would those be? 
> 
> {{champion:31}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:161}} 
> 
> I really feel like I just picked charmpions that were purple xD

You're close, you got 4 of them right (Syndra and Nocturne are not related to The Void at all whatsoever there, even though Nocturne does have a Void themed skin there though). Here are the others that you missed there though: 

{{champion:421}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:121}}

Also, only Malzahar and Kassadin are not Voidborns, but the rest of them are.

> [{quoted}](name=Airashi,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=paujYmMY,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-11T23:05:26.578+0000)
>
> HAHA my bad xD 
> 
> I need to brush up on my Lore!
> 
> I was wondering if you know other groups and see if I got these group correct?
> 
> Freljord Sisters: {{champion:22}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:113}}  **Feljiord Faction Rulers would be more accurate there since they're not related to each other at all whatsoever there** i think I'm going to add {{champion:201}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:20}}{{champion:48}}   in this group **In that case you might as well just call the group there Freljiord and be done with it.**
> 
> Sisters: {{champion:69}} {{champion:55}}  **Correct.**
> 
> Mentors and apprentice {{champion:40}} {{champion:37}} **Well from what I understand Janna did indeed teach Karma how to use her fans for battle, but Sona was taken in by Lestara Buvelle, her adoptive mother, who was later sadly killed by Sona's very own Etwahl. If you were to use the "Mentor and Apprentice" tag here, then replacing Sona for Karma would be much more appropriate if you really think about it there.**
> 
> Guardian Brothers and the Ascended: {{champion:58}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:15}}** Yep, nothing wrong with this group here as far as I can tell anyways.**
> 
> Sea creatures: {{champion:105}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}} **Eh, Nautilus is a bit of a stretch there if you ask me personally, as though he does technically have some "sea powers" of sorts, he was [formerly] a human at some point in time before then, so there's that at least. The rest is accurate there though regardless.**
> 
> Scientist: {{champion:27}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:112}}** Eh, Swain is more of a Tactician than an actual Scientist there, but the other 3 are most definitely scientists though, so there's that at least. **
> 
> I know its just rumors but, I think they should be a group
> {{champion:429}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:412}} **Hmm, well Lucian and Thresh are definitely rivals, that's for sure, but Kalista is from the Shadow Isles whereas Thresh is just a member of the Shadow Isles himself.**

Comments in bold.

Fantastic!
Thank you~ :3

I think I'll be taking your suggestions for the most part :D

> [{quoted}](name=Airashi,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=paujYmMY,comment-id=000800000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-12T00:28:31.359+0000)
>
> Fantastic!
> Thank you~ :3
> 
> I think I'll be taking your suggestions for the most park :D

Hey, you're welcome, I'm glad that I could help you out there.

P.S. If you could include a Voidling alongside Malzahar there as well, that would be great (just to stick with his overall theme there of course), thanks.

Made an edit regarding the champion portraits that you used.

whats different? o.O 

LOL

> [{quoted}](name=Airashi,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=paujYmMY,comment-id=0008000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-12T05:16:59.093+0000)
>
> whats different? o.O 
> 
> LOL

Basically for Valor and Clone you originally put Leblanc and Quinn respectively, so I simply swapped them around so future readers wouldn't get confused by that when they read it for themselves there, that's all.

Ahhh! 
I see it haha thank you! :3

Actually, I think that they are related (Ashe/Sej/Liss)— the original frosty sisters, avarosa, lissandra, and original boar lady did some stuff, blah blah watchers, blah blah velkoz, blah blah poros and howling abyss *tldr Ashe is Avarosa's descendant, Sej is origiboar's descendant, lissandra is herself.

Du Couteau Family— Kat, Cass, and Talon. (your stuff is awesome btw :D)

{{champion:91}}  is related to {{champion:55}} {{champion:69}} ?!?

Thank you :3

> [{quoted}](name=Airashi,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=paujYmMY,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2015-01-12T07:25:35.701+0000)
>
> {{champion:91}}  is related to {{champion:55}} {{champion:69}} ?!?
> 
> Thank you :3

No he's not, he just simply worked under Katarina's father and he's "friends" with Katarina herself, that's all. According to his lore: "Talon's earliest memories are the darkness of Noxus' underground passages and the reassuring steel of a blade. He remembers no family, warmth, or kindness. Instead, the clink of stolen gold and the security of a wall at his back are all the kinship he has ever craved.".

Oh Thank you~ 

Never read {{champion:91}} Lore
^yeah, what this guy said. He works closely with the Du Couteau family tho, and is kinda considered one even though he isn't related by blood.
